name: Achievement Hunter: Pharaoh
description:
Achievement Hunter: Pharaoh is a 2d action/shooter will take you to the times of the Egyptian pharaohs, when a person's life cost no more than a handful of sand.
You'll fight for the mummy, which was once a pharaoh, against the people who many years ago decided to poison you in an attempt of Coup d'etat.
Take revenge on your offenders and become the first pharaoh twice ascended to the throne.

Game features:
  • 5000 Achievements
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Brutal enemies
  • Lot of violence
